items.name: cta-1
items.title: Centered Accordion
items.description: This centered call to action section uses Shadcn Button components to present a clear call-to-action with primary and secondary options. The centered layout features a prominent headline with supporting text, encouraging user engagement through two distinct button styles.

items.name: faq-1
items.title: Centered Accordion
items.description: This FAQ section features a centered layout with an accordion-style interface, making it easy for users to find answers to their questions. The design includes subtle hover effects on all interactive elements while maintaining a clean, organized structure for site navigation.

items.name: faq-2
items.title: Accordion with Group
items.description: This FAQ section features a centered layout with an accordion-style interface, making it easy for users to find answers to their questions. The design includes subtle hover effects on all interactive elements while maintaining a clean, organized structure for site navigation.

items.name: native-accordion
items.title: Native Accordion
items.description: This accordion built using native HTML details and summary elements with Tailwind CSS animation for better SEO and no JavaScript library required..
